What are the biggest challenges in ensuring compliance with environmental and labor regulations across multiple countries? After-sales support and product recalls: 18. How is after-sales support coordinated across different regions, and what are the key challenges in providing consistent service? 19. How are continuous improvement initiatives integrated into the supply chain process to reduce lead times, costs, and carbon footprint? Digital systems and data analytics: 21. What role do data analytics and machine learning models play in providing predictive insights for inventory management and forecasting?
